entry.title: $2650 // BEAUTIFUL 1 BD + DEN APT WITH WASHER/DRYER NEAR CENTRAL PARK WEST
entry.content:
Gorgeous renovated one bedroom with a den (can be easily converted into 2 bedroom, but second bedroom wont have window), located steps away from COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY, CENTRAL PARK WEST, and SUBWAY (CATHEDRAL PKWY/110 ST ON B, C LINE).
This beautiful apartment features:
In-unit washer dryer
Jacuzzi spa bath
Dishwasher
Good closet space
Wooden Floor
High Ceilings
Exposed brick wall in one of the bedrooms
Easy walk-up - 2nd floor
Quiet
Video-intercom
2 AC units
Heat and water included in rent.

No security deposit is required with Rhino insurance. International students are welcome!
To see this and other apartments in the neighborhood, please email Inna at show contact info

entry.title: $2000 // 2 Bedroom - Large and Beautiful Apartment - St. John's University
entry.content:
**August 1st Move-In Date
**Showing available immediately


Spacious TWO-Bedroom/ONE Bathroom


A spacious and bright two bedrooms, one bathroom apartment close to all the essentials on the corner of 164th Street and 82nd Road; one block north of Grand Central Parkway and two blocks south of Union Turnpike. This is a convenient location for those working in Manhattan and students going to St. John's University.

Amenities:
Water Included
Mirrored Closet Doors
Outdoor private balcony
Time Warner, Verizon FiOS, DirecTV ready.
In-Wall Heat
In-Wall AC Ready (You will never have to put your ac in your window.)

Dimensions:
1st Bedroom: 12'X12'
Larger bedroom will easily fit two Full beds for students.
2nd Bedroom: 10.5'X9'
One Full or Queen Bed and Dresser.

Area:
Located in a safe neighborhood with ample lighting in front of Queens Hospital Center. Cuisines include: Asian, American, Halal and others down the street.
There is ample parking located on 82nd Road. Walking distance to the cleaners, two Laundromats, food, gas stations. You are conveniently located at express stops for the Q65 (in front of apartment), Q46 (164th Street/Union Turnpike) as well as QM1/5/6/7/8 (164th Street/Union Turnpike).

Sample Commute Times:
10 minutes walking to St. John's University Gate 6
15 minutes walking to Parsons F Train
42 minutes public transportation to Midtown Manhattan via Q65/F or Q46/E,F

Public Transportation:
Q46 from Kew Gardens (E/F -- Kew Gardens) to Springfield Boulevard, Glen Oaks, Long Island Jewish
Q65 from Jamaica (E -- Jamaica Center AirTrain JFK, LIRR, F -- Parsons Boulevard) to College Point (7 -- Main Street)
QM1/5/6 to Midtown Express
QM7/8 to Downtown Express


Please contact me at show contact info with any questions, showings taking place now!
